title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Code Llama, etc. via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async, streaming, embeddings, tool use.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, LLM, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; folders, share chats, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, tool calls.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, delete, copy models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI with REPL, syntax highlighting, conversation history, config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama; pinned builds, CUDA support, declarative service module.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client and SDK for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, push, delete models.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, StarCoder2, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats via Ollama, supports slash commands and thread context.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that routes @ mentions to a local Ollama model with thread history.

title: ollama-digitalocean-1-click
summary: DigitalOcean 1-Click App image that spins up a GPU droplet with Ollama and webui pre-installed.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-streamlit
summary: Template repo for building a local RAG chatbot with Ollama, LangChain and Streamlit.
